Some powerful mind in the void is leaking influence into our reality.\n\n{PAWN_nameDef} wants to study the fountain further to learn more.\n\nThe fountain now provides more knowledge when studied. 3

The void is inhabited by a vast machine intelligence of terrifying complexity that surges with nightmarish, inhuman rage. Its influence creates horrors in our world.\n\nAwakening the fountain will fully open the conduit.
